Touch Action

# Touch Action

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class                       | Support     |
| --------------------------- | ----------- |
| ```
touch-auto
```          | ğŸŒ Web only |
| ```
touch-none
```          | ğŸŒ Web only |
| ```
touch-pan-x
```         | ğŸŒ Web only |
| ```
touch-pan-left
```      | ğŸŒ Web only |
| ```

```     | ğŸŒ Web only |
| ```
